title: Former Bachelor winner Anna Heinrich flaunts her incredibly trim physique in a skimpy black bikini
text:
Former Bachelor winner Anna Heinrich isn't one to shy away from flaunting her incredibly trim physique on social media.

And on Friday, the 33-year-old criminal lawyer was captured in yet another revealing photo, which shows her flashing her washboard abs while on a recent holiday.

The photo, which was taken while Anna was holidaying in Marrakech with hubby Tim Robards in September, was recently re-posted to Bec and Bridge's Instagram page.

Taut-al babe! Anna Heinrich (pictured) has been captured in yet another revealing photo, which shows her flashing her washboard abs while on a recent holiday

In the candid snap, the blonde beauty is seen wearing the designer's chic black bikini, while lounging by the pool at the Palais Ronsard hotel in Marrakech.

'Pool ready with @annaheinrich1 in our wave rider set,' the accompanying caption stated.

Anna is all smiles as she flashes her pearly whites and casts a playful gaze at the camera, while reclining on the poolside daybed.

Not camera shy! Former Bachelor winner Anna Heinrich (pictured) isn't one to shy away from flaunting her incredibly trim physique on social media

Her makeup-free complexion shows off her incredibly youthful visage, and her usually-styled tresses are worn in loosely-flowing textured waves.

The blonde beauty previously shared the snap to her own Instagram back in September, which she simply captioned: '#MARRAKECH'.

The sultry snap was just one of several shots from her holiday, which showed her flaunting her enviable assets, that she shared to her social media.

Intermittent fasting: The 32-year-old criminal lawyer previously revealed she skips breakfast and doesn't eat her first meal until 'around midday'

Anna's post comes after she recently revealed the secret to her slender figure is all down to skipping the most important meal of the day - breakfast.

Speaking to The Daily Telegraph earlier this month, Anna said: 'I eat my first meal around midday.'

She added that she keeps things simple when it comes to her diet, saying: 'I eat to fuel my body more than anything else.'
description: Former Bachelor winner Anna Heinrich isn't one to shy away from flaunting her incredibly trim physique on social media.
authors: Mark Brook For Daily Mail Australia
